questions.text: How many penguins does it take to change a lightbulb?
options: A full tuxedoed team of five.
They outsource it to the polar bears.

questions.text: If a tree falls in a forest and no one's around, who updates the group chat?
options: No one, trees don’t do drama.

questions.text: What happens when a black hole gets stage fright?
options: It turns into a drama star.
It disappears in a puff of glitter.
